## AlbumOptions interface

Optional album configuration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface AlbumOptions 
```

## Properties

<table><thead><tr><th>

Property


</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[allowedExtensions?](./photo-dir-to-json.albumoptions.allowedextensions.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string\[\]


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ A list of case-insensitive extensions to match photo files inside the album. The files must be supported by [ExifReader](https://github.com/mattiasw/ExifReader#readme) library. Default: \['jpg', 'jpeg', 'png', 'webp'\]


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[metadataDir?](./photo-dir-to-json.albumoptions.metadatadir.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The path to a directory containing album metadata file. If this is specified, the metadata file is assumed to match the album's directory name. This cannot be specified with `metadataFile`<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[metadataFile?](./photo-dir-to-json.albumoptions.metadatafile.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The name of the metadata file inside of the album directory. E.g., `_metadata.json`<!-- -->. This cannot be specified with `metadataDir`<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[skippedExtensions?](./photo-dir-to-json.albumoptions.skippedextensions.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string\[\]


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Suppress warnings for files that are skipped in the album with these case-insensitive extensions. Default: \['json', 'ds\_store'\]


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
